attributes.action: Allow the people of Britain a referendum on restoring the death penalty
attributes.additional_details: Crimes of Terrorism and murder have become more frequent, the death penalty should be restored as a punishment and a deterrent
attributes.background: The people of Great Britain should be allowed a referendum on restoring the death penalty in the UK

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602435
